member.name: ColorLUT.GetParameters
member.summary: The ColorLUT.GetParameters method gets the current values of the parameters of this ColorLUT object.
member.param: Pointer to a UINT that specifies the size, in bytes, of a structure.
Pointer to a structure that receives the parameter values.
member.returns: This method does not return a value.

member.name: ColorLUT.SetParameters
member.summary: The ColorLUT.SetParameters method sets the parameters of this ColorLUT object.
member.param: Pointer to a structure that specifies the parameters.
member.returns: This method does not return a value.
